dcterms:creator: F. Potortì
S. Park
A. R. Jiménez Ruiz
dcterms:description: The EvAAL Framework is a set of rules and metrics designed for evaluating indoor localization systems, particularly in the context of competitions.
dcterms:title: EvAAL Framework

dcterms:creator: T. van Haute
E. de Poorter
J. Rossey
dcterms:description: The EVARILOS Benchmarking Handbook provides guidelines for the evaluation of RF-based indoor localization solutions, focusing on test and evaluation methodologies.
dcterms:title: EVARILOS Benchmarking Handbook

dcterms:creator: R. Ichikari
K. Kaji
R. Shimomura
dcterms:description: The PDR Challenge in Warehouse Picking 2017 dataset consists of measured data used for evaluating indoor localization systems in warehouse environments.
dcterms:title: PDR Challenge in Warehouse Picking 2017

dcterms:creator: R. Ichikari
K. Kaji
R. Shimomura
dcterms:description: The xDR Challenge for Warehouse Operations 2018 dataset includes measured data for evaluating indoor localization systems in warehouse settings.
dcterms:title: xDR Challenge for Warehouse Operations 2018

dcterms:description: ISO/IEC 18305:2016 is an international standard that defines terms, test scenarios, performance metrics, and reporting requirements for the testing and evaluation of localization and tracking systems.
dcterms:title: ISO/IEC 18305:2016 International Standard
